content.rendered:
EVOLUTION FRONT BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA LANDCRUISER 100 IS AVAILABLE NOW 

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat as standard with colour coding an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned in stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED foglights with DRL and Indicator and recovery points which are an option on many other brands.

-Our Evolution Bumper suitable for the Landcruiser 100 Series is compatible with front parking sensors and head lamp washers. Just let us know your if you have these at time of order to ensure you get the correct bar. We can provide blanketing plugs for vehicles that don’t require sensors or washers. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Foglights with DRL and Indicator

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT LANDCRUISER 100 series

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
